Ebe foto si, Nnenna Oti-Facebook
Ọkammụta Nnenna Oti nwetara nzere 'First Class' na mahadum University of Nigeria Nsukka'
Ndi ọnụ na-eru n´okwu na ọchịchị mahadum(governing council) 'Federal University of Technology'(FUTO)  Owere, emeela ntuliaka tụpụtara Ọkammụta Nnenna Oti maka ọkwa onyeiei mahadum ahụ.
Oti, onye meriri na ntuliaka ahụ e mere na nsonso a ji akara 75.5 merie onye na-esote ya bụ ọkammutụta Ikechukwu, onye nwetara akara 69.7 na ntuliaka ahụ nke a dị mmadụ asaa were zọọ.
Ị ma Sandie Okoro ada Igbo ọzọ welitere isi na World Bank?
Lee ihe gosiri na ụmụnwaanyị Igbo bụ ọkaibe
Uru nwaanyị abụghị sọ n'ụsọekwu
Technovation: Lee ụlọakwụkwọ ụmụaka ise ahụ turula ugo ọkaibe n'asompi technụzụ
Pro-chancelor Mahadum ahụ Ọkammụta John Offem kwuru na mmadụ iri abụọ na ịdọlu debara aha ha maka ịzọ ọkwa ahụ, mana mmadụ asaa bụ ndị a họpụtara maka ịzọ ọkwa ahụ.
Oti ga-anọchie anya onye nke na apụapụ bụ ọkammụta Francis Eze.
Ebe foto si, Nnenna Oti

Odoziakụ Oti bụ nwaanyi mbụ ruru ogogo onyeisi mahadum FUTO nwere ọtụtụ nzere nakwa nturu ugo, bụ ọkammụta na ngalaba agụmakwụkwọ  na-ahụ maka aja na nchekwa ogbe ọnatarachi(Soil and Environmental Science).
O nwetara nzere agụmakwụkwọ nke mbụ ya dika ọkaibe na ngalaba agụmakwụkwọ  'Soil Science' na Mahadum 'University of Nigeria Nsukka(UNN).
O nwekwara nzere nke abụọ ya na mahadum UNN.

Dika azụ eru ala na mmụta , ọ zọpụrụ njem agụmakwụkwọ n´ụlọakwụkwọ 'Catholic University Leuven', nke mba Belgium, ebe ọ nọrọ gụọ maka" irrigation engineering".Ọkammụta Oti amarala nke ekwe na-akụ na ngalaba agụmakwụkwọ,mmụta na ụkpụrụ ọchịchị ụlọakwụkwọ tinyekwara nke mba ofesi kemgbe afọ iri atọ na anọ.
O deela ihe karịrị akwụkwọ iri isi na ise, kuzie n' ọgbakọ pụrụ iche iri anọ na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ.
A na-eto nwaanyi akịdị na nke ọ gwọrọ , ya agwọta ọzọ, ngwa lee ntuweugo dị iche iche e tuwere ya:
Ọ bụrụ ọkaibe(First Class) na ụmụakwụkwọ gụchapụrụ na ngalaba agụmakwụkọ 'Soil Science'  nke mahadum UNN na afọ 1982.
Ntuweugo agụmakwụkwọ n'efu site n' aka gọmenti Imo n' afọ 1977.
N' afọ 1986 na 1987, otu 'European Economic Community scholarship (ECC) tuwekwara ya ugo maka ịkwalite mba dị iche iche na mahadum 'Catholic University, Leuven' nke mba Belgium.
Ọ nọchitere anya mpagara Ọwụwa-Anyanwụ n' aha Ebonyi Steeti n' ọgbakọ ukwu ọchịchị etiti e nwere na afọ 2014.
Dr Nnannaya Oti bụ di ya ebe chineke ji ụmụ atọ gozie ha.
